articles.author: Valerie Ettenhofer
articles.title: The Wild Bunch & American Graffiti Actor Bo Hopkins Has Passed Away At 80 - /Film
articles.description: Actor Bo Hopkins, best known for his roles in The Wild Bunch and American Graffiti, has died.
articles.content: Hopkins would work with Peckinpah again in 1972's "The Getaway," and kept choosing interesting roles alongside talented filmmakers for the remainder of his career. In the '90s, he appeared in Oliver … [+1568 chars]

articles.title: 'Most powerful meteor storm in generations could light up skies above North America early next week - Daily Mail
articles.description: The most powerful meteor storm 'in generations' could light up skies above North America on Tuesday morning, according to NASA.
articles.content:
The 'most powerful meteor storm in generations' could light up skies above North America next week.
